import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Table from './table' import Socket from '../socket' import axios from 'axios' export default function Asistencia() { const [checadas,setChecadas] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const fechData = async()=>{ const res = await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/checadas/') setChecadas(res.data) console.log(res.data) } fechData() Socket.on('checada',(data)=>{ console.log(data) }) },[]) return (

Asistencias

) }
